sentences.sContent: a brief interlude of peace before a return to the battlefield
sentences.sCn: 重返战场之前的短暂平静

synos.tran: 插曲；穿插；幕间节目；[数]插算

remMethod.val: inter + lud(玩耍) + e → 在活动与活动中间的玩闹时间 → 间歇

trans.tranOther: a period of time between two events or situations, during which something different happens
